title: Sampler, 1853
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin and stem stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Lo izo Dolores Obando en la enseñanza de la Academia de Puebla en el Mes de Mayo del año de 1853
description: Sampler is divided into five panels by striped borders. In the largest center panel is a vase of flowers. On each side is a wreath containing the inscription "Lo izo Dolores Obando en la enseñanza de la Academia de Puebla en el Mes de Mayo del año de 1853." At the bottom are two floral bands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1853.
1853. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin and stem stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-396.
